title: Lf You Want To Be A Worker For The Lord,
lyrics:
lf you want to be a worker for the Lord,
Bring yuh bible and come,
lf you want to be a worker for the Lord.
Bring yuh bible and come,
lf you want to be a worker for the Lord,
Bring yuh bible and come,
We gonna rip down,
Pull down, kick out Satan,
Bring yuh bible and come.
